Footer.title: Created by
Footer.about: Built with ❤️ by developers for developers

HeroSection.title: REST Client
HeroSection.description: A modern, intuitive REST API testing tool built by 200 OK team, RS School students. Streamline your API development workflow with our powerful client.

FeaturesSection.title: Why REST Client?
FeaturesSection.description: Built with modern web technologies and designed for the best developer experience.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Optimized performance with instant response visualization and request history.

secureReliable.title: Secure & Reliable
secureReliable.description: Data security is fully guaranteed through the implementation of Firebase Authentication standards.

modernWebTech.title: Modern Web Tech
modernWebTech.description: Built with Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for the best performance and UX.

TeamSection.title: Meet Our Team
TeamSection.description: Passionate developers building the future of API testing tools.

alex.name: Aliaksandr Strelchanka
alex.description: Aliaksandr is a responsible and thoughtful team member who always brings a calm and focused attitude to the work. His contributions helped keep the project on track and moving forward smoothly.

mikhail.name: Mikhail Il'in
mikhail.description: Mikhail is a proactive and dedicated teammate with a strong sense of teamwork. He brings positive energy to the group and consistently supports the team's progress with great attention.

olga.name: Olga Dubodel
olga.description: Olga is an attentive and creative member of the team. She approaches tasks with care and always brings a collaborative spirit, helping to maintain a friendly and productive team environment.

CourseSection.title: Our Team Project
CourseSection.description: REST Client is the final project of the RS School React 2025 Q3 course - a collaborative effort that brings together key concepts of modern web development in a practical, real-world tool.

openToEveryone.title: Open to everyone
openToEveryone.description: Free courses, no obligations, and no contracts. No age limit. Only students' time and dedication are required. Students can repeatedly attend courses.

openSource.title: Open source philosophy
openSource.description: Our Learning Management System platform and educational materials are publicly available on GitHub and YouTube.

teachForward.title: Teach it forward
teachForward.description: Students study at school for free, but we request that they return as mentors to pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students.

CourseSection.aboutProjectDescription: Over an 3-week period, we built this REST client to apply core concepts of modern web development - including React-based architecture, API communication, state management and deployment workflows.
CourseSection.footerNote: This project reflects our practical knowledge of the React ecosystem and showcases everything we've learned during the RS School React 2025 Q3 course.

ActionSection.title: Ready to Try REST Client?
ActionSection.description: Built with modern web technologies and designed for developers who need a reliable, fast, and intuitive API testing experience.

RestClient.title: REST client
RestClient.description: Test and debug your APIs with our powerful REST client interface

Variables.title: Variables
Variables.subtitle: Variables
Variables.description: Manage variables for your API requests

History.description: View your API request history and performance metrics

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. Please check the URL or navigate back home.
